Nick Schueler.bio: I have been involved with robotics for many years so it's nice to see a club finally take form at RPI. I look forward to seeing what we can accomplish.

Liam Keegan.bio: I am a third year student at Rensselaer, and in addition to the Robotics Club, I am involved with Club Baseball and the Spikeball Club. I am not a business major, but they made me the treasurer anyway, so I am excited to build some robots and make various irresponsible purchases with club funds.
